page.title: 13 Bury Tip
page.content:
Our school wall backs on to Bury tip. In the Summer we could not open our classroom windows because of the awful {smells}that used to come from the tip. We also used to get covered in a fine {grey dust}that blew off the top of the tip. It used to get in your eyes and it hurt. Sometimes we could not go out at break because of the dust and smells. In winter the rubbish used to blow around the school.
All this has changed now because of a brand new{compactor plant}which replaces the tip. Five men work the plant and all the rubbish is tipped straight into skips and pushed under great pressure into a new skip. It is driven away to Wigan where it is treated and got rid off. This Summer has been very pleasant for us. Joanne Dyer age9
